#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int abs(int a, int b) {
    if (a > b) return (a-b);
    else return (b-a);
}

int main()
{
    char a[4][4];
    for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
        for (int j = 0; j < 4; j++) {
            cin >> a[i][j];
        }
    }

    int cnt = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
        for (int j = 0; j < 3; j++) {
            int counta = 0, countb = 0;
            if (a[i][j] == 'a') {counta++;}
            else {countb++;}
            if (a[i][j+1] == 'a') {counta++;}
            else {countb++;}
            if (a[i+1][j] == 'a') {counta++;}
            else {countb++;}
            if (a[i+1][j+1] == 'a') {counta++;}
            else {countb++;}
            int t = abs(counta, countb);
            if (t == 2 || t == 4) cnt++;
        }
     }

    if (cnt > 0) cout << "POSSIBLE\n";
    else cout << "NOT POSSIBLE\n";

    return 0;
}
